entity.name: Kristi Noem
entity.description: US Representative Kristi Noem (SD At large)

text:
In a time when big government has taken control of almost everything (from fishing rights, to buying garden seeds, to traveling to a relative’s home) in most places

Governor @KristiNoem has courageously looked the mob in the eye and said, “No.”

https://t.co/GSnEySxUuA
